title: best tanks atm?
body: been off league for a while, just wondering who the good tanks are these days :) tia

replies.body: All top laners or jgs LEL Cinderhulk is so op

Cinderhulk is the replacement for the Juggernaut enchantment - It's like a sunfire cape and a spirit of the ancient golem combined. It's so damn OP.

As for good tanks, pretty much all of them because of the Cinderhulk...

Best ones for jungle are probably: 
- Sejuani (I really hate playing against her)
- Gragas
- There's some more but I can't think of them off the top of my head, basically any champion that scales off of maximum health in some way or another.

What people have recently been doing is taking smite to toplane so they can have the cinderhulk as well. Yes, Cinderhulk is just that OP.

The Almost perm bans are Sejuani, Nautilis, Gragas and others that are strong right now are Chogath (played ap tank), Hecarim, Shyvana
But yes others are good just these i see are being played MORE then others now
But lately I've seen smite tp mundo top being kinda strong always winning lane
ty for the replies ladies n gents :)
Depends on where your going and what you are using them for (IE: Ranked, Normals, carry tanks or full tanks.)
